channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump brokered Netanyahu's participation at Gaza peace conference in Egypt
item.description: At President Trump's request, Egyptian president Abdul Fattah al-Sisi invited Israeli prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu to the Gaza peace conference i...

item.title: JPMorgan announces $1.5 trillion U.S. investment initiative
item.description: JPMorgan announced Monday that it's planning a $1.5 trillion investment initiative aimed at bolstering sectors critical to the U.S. economy over the n...

item.title: All 20 surviving hostages freed by Hamas under Gaza peace deal
item.description: Hamas released all 20 living Israeli hostages on Monday morning as part of the Gaza peace deal brokered by the Trump administration. Why it matters: T...

item.title: Scoop: Direct meeting between Trump envoys and Hamas leaders sealed Gaza deal
item.description: An unusual and dramatic meeting last Wednesday between President Trump's envoys and Hamas leaders helped get the Gaza peace deal across the line, thre...

item.title: Trump lands in Israel after declaring Gaza war over
item.description: President Trump landed in Israel on Monday amid the release of Israeli hostages held by Hamas. Trump said on Sunday that the war in Gaza was over and ...

item.title: Congress is losing its grip on the power to spend Americans’ money
item.description: Congress is supposed to control spending, but increasingly, the White House is dictating how America’s money is used.

item.title: Historic wave of retirements is putting huge strains on the government
item.description: Tens of thousands of federal employees have taken retirement or other voluntary departures on top of the Trump administration’s latest layoffs.

item.title: Trump escalates his use of federal power to target Democratic states
item.description: Democrats see a clear pattern of inflicting pain on places that are politically unfriendly, while Trump has declared his intent to hurt liberal areas ...

item.title: Why Republicans’ attempts to kill Obamacare keep backfiring
item.description: The White House and some Republicans are growing nervous that Democrats’ demand to boost Obamacare as part of a government funding bill has salience w...

item.title: A conservative influencer was arrested in Portland. Trump was watching.
item.description: After conservative influencer Nick Sortor was arrested outside an ICE facility in Portland, Donald Trump latched on to justify a federal crackdown.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
